Title: A Day Unlike Any Other
Writer: Joshua Fine (story), Jack Kirby (comic book), Joe Simon (comic book), Christopher Yost
Actors: Graham McTavish, Rick D. Wasserman, Colleen O'Shaughnessey, Clancy Brown
Plot: Eight of the nine realms of Asgard have fallen, only the Earth remains. The Avengers are all that stands between Loki and total conquest.
